
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/19006888" title="发布于 2025-07-27 05:05">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">推荐 6 款基于 .NET 开源的串口调试工具，调试效率提升利器！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>今天大姚给大家分享 6 款基于 .NET 开源的串口调试工具，旨在帮助 .NET 开发者们更好的应对通讯调试方面的学习和工作，提升调试效率。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>优秀项目和框架精选</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>本文所有项目都已收录到C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架精选中，关注优秀项目和框架精选能让你及时了解C#、.NET和.NET Core领域的最新动态和最佳实践，提高开发工作效率和质量。假如你有更好的推荐，欢迎大家踊跃提交PR推荐或自荐（<strong>让优秀的项目和框架不被埋没</strong><span>🤞）。</span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>GitHub开源地址：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>Gitee开源地址：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectPicks.md</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>LLCOM</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>LLCOM是一个.NET开源的、功能强大的串口调试工具。支持Lua自动化处理、串口调试、串口监听、串口曲线、TCP测试、MQTT测试、编码转换、乱码恢复等功能。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>项目开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/chenxuuu/llcom" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/chenxuuu/llcom</span></a></span></li>
<li><span>项目详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247497152&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=48301107e73a41ab9214c18b7889f2c3&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/bqJz8LjdnhpUR_6ynG0soQ</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050050142-2083749234.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050145391-689416861.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050151490-69573607.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Wu.CommTool</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Wu.CommTool是一款基于C#、WPF、Prism、MaterialDesign、HandyControl开发的通讯调试工具（支持Modbus RTU、MQTT调试，界面色彩丰富）。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>项目开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/Monika1313/Wu.CommTool" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/Monika1313/Wu.CommTool</span></a></span></li>
<li><span>项目详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247500558&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=663eebbd10ba09661ff111de8bd0209c&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/7nTJeZIyr3buTvYhI1w-ZQ</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050239154-1763598428.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050245179-482724065.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050252661-802600419.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>BYSerial</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>BYSerial是一款基于 WPF 开源（MIT License）、免费、功能全面的串口调试工具，支持中英文双语切换，具有通用串口调试工具的一般功能，如串口通讯调试、TCP通讯调试、支持串口接收数据曲线显示等。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>项目开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/LvYiWuHen/byserial" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/LvYiWuHen/byserial</span></a></span></li>
<li><span>项目详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247509905&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=31dd11ca76b549ca5e191da34903b252&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/cAb5GExmhU0_6mw-M3iHRA</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050324769-195805513.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050329203-1180301471.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050334913-1280184560.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>PLC-CommunTools</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>PLC-CommunTools是一款基于.NET WinForm开发的一款硬件及协议通讯工具，包含各类厂商的PLC协议及基础的TCP、串口通讯、IO口通讯等协议通讯功能的实现整合，注意还有一部分功能作者还在努力完善中。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>项目开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/SmallRob/PLC-CommunTools" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/SmallRob/PLC-CommunTools</span></a></span></li>
<li><span>项目详细介绍：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a class="normal_text_link" href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247508560&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=56dc8f3eadc40a85b80aee1afe217e60&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/29gvIBLmFugemDUh_gNuVg</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050400744-1075601292.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050405522-1757787447.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050410551-43340563.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>SerialDebug</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>SerialDebug是一款基于 C# 的串口调试助手，支持进制转换，可编辑发送队列，支持XModem、YModem传输协议。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>项目开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/mcuxmx/SerialDebug" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/mcuxmx/SerialDebug</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050432104-1757435606.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050437445-769744865.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050442895-1098241209.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>OSDA</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>OSDA是一个基于 C# 开源（MIT License）的串口调试助手，其功能包括基础功能（打开、关闭、接收、发送、清接收区、清发送区和清空计数）、十六进制（HEX）接收，十六进制（HEX）发送、流控制（握手协议、控制协议）等。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>项目开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/leven9/OSDA" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/leven9/OSDA</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050506126-1832877315.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250727050511619-1176200960.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
</div>
